version_description:
Added support for game controllers
Added Facebook login
Keyboard fixes
On 3GS, iPhone 4, iPod 4 and iPad1: requires iOS5 or higher

Monster snowmen!
Improved Facebook house sharing
Fixed crashes

Improved download of files
Added support for Trialpay offers
Fixed problems with screen size and performance. Fixed incompatibility with new iOS8 version

This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

Fixed problems with performance.

This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

Fixed problems with performance.
